tasks.title: Complete the project report
tasks.objective: Ensure all sections are reviewed and finalized.
tasks.description: Finalize the project report and submit it by the end of the week.

tasks.title: Prepare for the team meeting
tasks.objective: Gather all necessary documents and prepare the agenda.
tasks.description: Ensure all team members are updated on the project status before the meeting.
checklist: Collect project updates from team members

tasks.title: Conduct user testing
tasks.objective: Test the new features with real users and gather feedback.
tasks.description: Schedule and conduct user testing sessions to evaluate the new features.

tasks.title: Update the website content
tasks.objective: Refresh the content to reflect the latest company updates.
tasks.description: Review and update the website content to ensure it is current and accurate.

tasks.title: Plan the marketing campaign
tasks.objective: Develop a strategy for the upcoming marketing campaign.
tasks.description: Create a detailed plan for the marketing campaign including target audience and channels.

tasks.title: Leg Day Gym Session
tasks.objective: Work on my leg muscles in the gym today
tasks.description: Strengthen and build lower body with squats, lunges, deadlifts, and accessory work. Focus on quads, hamstrings, glutes, and calves. Include warm-up, cool-down, and stretching.
